Travel to Moonrise Towers Walkthrough

After you saved Halsin (quest Save the refugees), you learn from him that the parasites seem to be coming from Moonrise Towers. There are three ways to Travel to Moonrise Towers, the Risen Road, a mountain pass, or via tunnels in the Underdark.
